name: iHome iBT68 - Speaker - for portable use - wireless - Bluetooth - translucent gray | Dell USA
description: Bring the party wherever you go with the iBT68 Bluetooth speaker with speakerphone. Stream music wirelessly from your Bluetooth-enabled device. Enjoy your music without missing a call. Compact speaker fits in your hand, yet offers surprisingly rich, detailed sound. Color changing mode for fun, fabulous color effects. Operates on internal rechargeable battery, charges via included USB charging cable.
